example.name: almost literal
example.text: In addition, the Cray-3 will contain 16 processors -- twice as many as the largest current supercomputer.
example.arg: 16 processors -- twice as many as the largest current supercomputer

predicate.note: Frames file for 'contain' based on survey of sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class contiguous_location-47.8, other framed members are cover. Also comparison with 'hold'
